display.title: What about my mob farm?
description: Just so you're aware - vanilla farms such as &&7Iron Golems&&r or &&ePiglins&&r have been &&4disabled&&r in this pack. There are obviously ways to cheese the pack (such as some good old Minecraft &&acapitalism&&r, &&mif you catch our drift&&r), but we encourage you to try to play without taking advantage of some notorious vanilla "&&ocheese&&r".

It's possible that in the future, we'll just make a core-mod for the pack, so players can re-enable the disabled mob drops. For now, the drops are disabled via &&5KubeJS script&&r, so if you're script-savvy, the file can be removed at &&o&&7server_scripts/vanilla/loot_drops.js&&r.

subtitle.text: Is it safe? Is it alright?
